question: There are 83 second-graders at Sunny Hill School. 33 of them are girls. On Thursday, 2 second-grade girls and 2 second-grade boys were absent. How many second grade boys were at Sunny Hill School on Thursday?
answer:
Of the 83 second graders, 33 are girls, so 83 students - 33 girls = <<83-33=50>>50 boys.
On Thursday there were 50 boys - 2 absent = <<50-2=48>>48 boys.
#### 48
